Wakeup after long sleep or button press

dev board WeMos D1 Mini
chip ESP8266
features EEPROM button sleep wakeup

Before starting

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. Blinky ESP8266

Buy the components

  1. WeMos D1 Mini

Code

Download code long-sleep-or-button-press.ino

Makefile

Schematic

Wire up the hardware accordingly

Description

Wakeup periodically after long sleep (more than 1 hour) or on button press. ESP8266 will wake up after 23 minutes even if the time set is more than that because of timer limits.
